name: Zombread (ATWO)
description:
This is a thrilling and action-packed game where the player must tap the screen to eliminate hordes of zombies that are approaching. The gameplay is fast-paced and intense, requiring quick reflexes and precision to successfully defeat the zombies and progress through the levels. The graphics and sound effects are top-notch, immersing the player in a realistic and terrifying zombie apocalypse. The player must strategize and prioritize which zombies to eliminate first in order to survive. With each level, the difficulty increases, introducing new and more powerful zombies, making the game even more challenging and exciting. It's not just about tapping the screen, but also about using the right timing, aim and tactics to outsmart the zombies.

and the words above are the games that I actually want to make, but no. 

this is casual tap game

I was fortunate enough to have the opportunity to dive deeper into the world of game development. I was able to learn the fundamental principles and techniques of game creation, which has greatly enhanced my understanding and ability to make games.

credit to @LazyHamsters for the toast zombie asset
and https://scut.itch.io/7drl-tileset-2018 for the tileset asset
